≪Warning≫
This story is fiction and has nothing to do with any real person or organization.

≪Basic operation≫
[Arrow keys], [WASD]:Move
[Z], [Space], [Enter]:OK
[X], [esc]:Cancel, Open Item
[Shift]:Attack
*Key configurations and controller settings are changeable in the "Options" section of the title.
＊The lower left UI is not accurate even if the key configuration is changed.
＊The window may appear fixed when the Shift key is pressed, but this can be changed in the settings on the Windows side.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL

name: [Demo]Nine-Tailed Okitsune Tale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 /11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1
